item.title: Site presentation
item.description:
Day for presentation. Our project was to create a community portal for an organization, including a news feed, events, member lists and discussion forums.

Edited by Bertil Johansson@ 2022/08/20 20:25:09

item.title: Site launch
item.description:
Day for site launch. We will see if it is possible to host the site on freeasphosting.net

Edited by Bertil Johansson@ 2022/08/20 20:26:44

item.title: Say Hello Party
item.description:
We will celebrate the completion of  our studies with a Say Hello Party on Saturday 2022-09-03.


 We're starting a new category that we're naming Other. In that category, we create a topic that we call random talk. In that topic we start a 'Say Hello Party' subject.


We will invite the students in the other groups to our forum. If they want, they can register and can contribute a hello in our 'Say Hello Party'.
